summary: Clifford A. Fenton, Jr. is identified through payroll authorization forms related to his employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). The documents include a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding HSCA staff payroll records, specifically addressing the postponement of Social Security numbers. While the documents do not explicitly detail Fenton's specific role within the HSCA, they confirm his employment and association with the committee's investigation into the JFK assassination. Other documents in the set do not mention Fenton.
significance: Clifford A. Fenton, Jr.'s significance lies in his employment with the HSCA, the committee tasked with investigating the JFK assassination. The payroll records document his involvement, although the specific nature and extent of his contribution to the investigation are not detailed in the provided documents.
